title: An Indian company is set to build a $2 billion AI hub with Nvidia’s GPUs and go public. Here's what we know so far
summary_full: Yotta Data Services, which controls up to 70% of India’s GPU capacity, said surging demand from local AI startups and global tech firms is tightening supply.
summary_public: Yotta Data Services, which controls up to 70% of India’s GPU capacity, said surging demand from local AI startups and global tech firms is tightening supply.
